Articles.Content:
What are your plans for the upcoming version?

I haven't been that up to date with KSP recently, but I would like to see where the community is at with the inevitable 0.22 update.

A major topic talked at the moment is the new resources that will be available.

Please share your thoughts.

A major topic talked at the moment is the new resources that will be available.

Which ones are those?

I don't think they were specified.

I don't see why they're a major topic then. Who's talking about them at the moment?
the resources were originally planned for .19 but they were pushed off until later. currently they are working on career mode.

@ regex

I don't see why you are trying to start an argument.

If you look at the talk about 0.21, you'll find that resources were not added, even though they have been anticipated.

@ regex

I don't see why you are trying to start an argument.

I'm not, but [citation needed], because the only talk about resources I've seen is people whining about them not being in the game yet.
Alright then. I see your point and I apologize for being wrong.
In .22: CAREER MODE! No seriously, it really is. I haven't seen anything about resources though.

@ regex

I don't see why you are trying to start an argument.

If you look at the talk about 0.21, you'll find that resources were not added, even though they have been anticipated.

Why did you mention resources then? The big guys in .22 (As far as I have seen) are R&D and subassemblies.

Resources have been talked about since .19, but the Devs decided to leave that aspect aside and work on the career mode. This is why:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/entry.php/303-A-rant-about-development-asymptotes

You joined in early-2012, should already know this.
